snippet.title: Shadows Of Kurgansk – Survival Horror
snippet.description:
Shadows of Kurgansk is a single player horror survival title that transports players into a dark and hostile environment called the Zone, challenging them to escape the haunted area sane and alive. Search, hunt and discover to find the way out.
Game developed by independent Yadon Studio, supported by Gaijin inCubator.

Available on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/463860
More information at: http://shadowskurgansk.net/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShadowsOfKurgansk/
VK: https://new.vk.com/shadowsofkurgansk
